.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColumnModification extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Update.IColumnModification

summary.para: This type is typically used by database providers; it is generally not used in application code.

remarks.para: Represents an update, insert, or delete operation for a single column. contain lists of .
See Implementation of database providers and extensions for more information and examples.
